lead_paragraph: The president of the Samarco mining company and six other people have been charged with aggravated homicide over the deaths of at least 17 people after a dam burst in November.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: 7 Charged Over Dam Disaster

snippet: The president of the Samarco mining company and six other people have been charged with aggravated homicide over the deaths of at least 17 people after a dam burst in November.
abstract: Police in Brazilian state of Minas Gerais request that Ricardo Vescovi, president of Samarco mining company, and six others be held in preventive detention while awaiting trial for aggravated homicide after dam burst in November 2015, killing 17 people.
